# <a name="insert-a-picture-in-an-email-message"></a><span data-ttu-id="27291-102">Vstavite sliko v e-pošto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27291-102">Insert a picture in an email message</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27291-103">Če želite dodati sliko, ki v telesu vaše e-pošte, lahko dodate sliko v vrstici.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27291-103">If you want to add an image that displays in the body of your email, you can add an inline image.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="27291-104">Izberite na</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27291-104">Select the</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="27291-105">**Vstavljanje slik v vrstici** na dnu podokna sestavi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27291-105">**Insert pictures inline** at the bottom of the compose pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="27291-106">Poiščite mesto za sliko v računalniku, jo izberite in nato izberite **Odpri**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27291-106">Browse to the location of the picture on your computer, select it, and then select **Open**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="27291-107">Spoznati druge načine za prilagajanje sporočila, glejte [razdelek prilagoditev vaše e-poštno sporočilo v Outlooku na spletu](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="27291-107">To learn about other ways to personalize your message, see [Customize your email message in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41).</span></span>
